events.name: Tempo - 3x8' @ 80–85% (INDOOR)
events.description: Warm-up, 3x8' tempo intervals at 80–85% FTP, 85–95 rpm cadence, 4' easy recovery between intervals. AMBER: reduce intervals or intensity; RED: replace with 5x2' VO2-lite @110–115%. Cool-down.

events.name: Endurance Z2 - 2h30 (OUTDOOR)
events.description: Long endurance ride at 62–71% FTP, 85–95 rpm cadence. Fuel 80–100 g carbs/hr, 700–1000 mg sodium/hr, 600–900 ml fluids/hr. Start fueling within 15–20 min. If drift >5%, reduce intensity and increase fluids/Na.
